mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Dr. Sidney Isenberg Collection on Carson McCullers Papers, 1948-1971
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Smith, Margarita G. ("Rita")
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Rita Smith (Carson McCullers's sister) thanks Isenberg for his telegram at the time of Carson's death.
There are several files available. There is one JPG image for each page of the original document. A PDF was created from scans of the original document and includes all pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Funeral service
Friendship
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Rita Smith to Dr. Sidney Isenberg, May 29, 1968 (correspondence)
